name: Underground Overthrow
description:
Description

You are recruited by the Underground Hacker Movement to look into Global Government secrets. But beware, your surveillance tech locker is not 100% foolproof. Race against the clock as you research, social engineer, and hack your way into Waddlemar Warring’s email!

Theme

Underground Overthrow follows the UNDERGROUND theme because the player is an underground hacker.

BREATHTAKING

The desktop backgrounds are scenic views.

NEXT!

The player is given a new fake ID and computer every time surveillance tech catches them and they ‘die’.

DEAL WITH THE DEVIL

If surveillance tech catches mildly suspicious behaviour that isn’t immediately incriminating, they will offer the player a deal to turn in any Underground Hacker Movement contacts.

Gameplay

Follow prompts and clues from the dark web to answer Waddlemar’s email security questions. Scan through articles, video interviews, and even catfish his son to get the answers. Just make sure you close your windows whenever Surveillance Tech goes back online. Otherwise, you’re busted!

Controls

Mouse - move
Left click - interact

Credits
